text.div:
MeasureReportType

The type of the measure report

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/measure-report-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
individual IndividualAn individual report that provides information on the performance for a given measure with respect to a single patient
patient-list Patient ListA patient list report that includes a listing of patients that satisfied each population criteria in the measure
summary SummaryA summary report that returns the number of patients in each population criteria for the measure

name: MeasureReportType
description: The type of the measure report

concept.definition: An individual report that provides information on the performance for a given measure with respect to a single patient
A patient list report that includes a listing of patients that satisfied each population criteria in the measure
A summary report that returns the number of patients in each population criteria for the measure
